description.raw:
There was a bug in the dockerfile generation, not scaping the PATH and LD\_LIBRARY\_PATH variables when using nvidia-docker. That was kill the previous paths set and leaving only the nvidia paths.

That was making the [AWS jenkins jobs to fail because](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo10-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia_test_drogon/2/console) it can not find /sbin, used by locale-gen.

[Fixed](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-gazebo10-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia_test_drogon/14/) with this PR. Also tested in old nodes, [r2d2.](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_rendering-ci-default-bionic-amd64_test_drogon/6/console)
